div.p: No.128, p. 640, unit 83, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to inform you that an Order in Council has been obtained continuing your service until the 30th of June 1889 notwithstanding you have attained the age of 60 years.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;
